text: The Miss Universe Canada 2003 pageant was held on March 1, 2003. The winner represented Canada in the Miss Universe 2003 and was a semifinalist. The first runner-up represented Canada in Miss International 2003. ==Final results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 95%;" |- ! Final results !
